translation.Connect aelf wallet to view transaction: Connect aelf wallet to view transaction history
translation.Grant permission to access your funds?: Grant permission to access your funds?
translation.cross-chain transfer between aelf and ot: cross-chain transfer between aelf and other public chains (e.g. MainChain AELF to Ethereum).
translation.cross-chain transfer within aelf ecosyst: cross-chain transfer within aelf ecosystem, between MainChain and SideChains (e.g. MainChain AELF to SideChain tDVV) or between different SideChains (e.g. SideChain tDVV to SideChain tDVW).
translation.When the network is not congested: When the network is not congested:
translation.The minimum crosschain transaction fee i: The minimum crosschain transaction fee is around
translation.Estimated time of heterogenous cross-cha: Estimated time of heterogenous cross-chain arrival is {{time}}
translation.Estimated time of homogeneous cross-chai: The estimated time of internal cross-chain transaction is {{time}} minutes
The estimated time of internal cross-chain transaction is {{time}} minutes.
translation.Estimated time of arrival in AELF is: Estimated time of arrival in AELF is {{time}} minutes.
translation.Estimated time of arrival is: Estimated time of arrival is {{time}} minutes.
translation.Once the token is sent cross-chain: Once the token is sent cross-chain, the recipient needs to visit eBridge, connect the "To" wallet, and select the "Receipt ID" to receive the token. This will incur transaction fees on {{toChain}} so the recipient should ensure there a sufficient balance to pay for the fees.
translation.The cross-chain transaction fee will be: Upon the completion of the transaction, the tokens will automatically reflect in the recipient's wallet and can be checked on the blockchain explorer.
translation.Tokens will arrive automatically after b: You only need to pay for transaction fees generated on {{fromChain}} as fees on aelf will be covered by eBridge.
translation.Cross Chain time: Estimated time of heterogenous cross-chain arrival is {{heterogeneous}}
translation.Tokens will arrive automatically after b: You only need to pay for transaction fees generated on {{fromChain}} as fees on aelf will be covered by eBridge.
Please allow some time for tokens to be shown automatically in your wallet.
translation.The cross-chain transaction fee will be: Upon the completion of the transaction, the tokens will automatically reflect in the recipient's wallet and can be checked on the blockchain explorer.
translation.Estimated time of sending tokens is time: Estimated time of arrival is {{time}} minutes.
translation.Initiate cross-chain transfer to the rec: Enter recipient address and send (no need to connect the "To" wallet)
translation.Click the button to receive the token(s): Click the button to receive the token(s) transferred
translation.Transaction is being processed, please d: Transaction is being processed, please don't close this window.
translation.To add a new token, you need to initiate: To add a new token, you need to initiate 2 transactions here to create the token on {{chain}}
translation.This token does not exist on: This token does not exist on {{chain}}
translation.Click the button below to proceed: Click the button below to proceed.
translation.Request submitted. Please synchronize th: Request submitted. Please synchronize the token info.
translation.The amount to be transferred should be s: Transaction request failed. The amount to be transferred should be smaller than {{amount}} {{symbol}}.
translation.Invalid evm chain: The chain where your wallet is located is not yet supported by eBridge!
translation.Notification Content Section 1: This is an ALPHA version of eBridge. As such, delays may occur, and catastrophic bugs may lurk. Thanks, for trying it at this early stage.
translation.Notification Content Section 2: For any issues, join our Telegram group for support:

Upgrade Notice.section 2: We are currently upgrading our system to serve you better. During this period, the eBridge service is temporarily unavailable. We kindly advise you to refrain from using the service at this moment to avoid any potential inconveniences or losses.
Upgrade Notice.section 3: We appreciate your understanding and patience and look forward to providing you with an improved eBridge experience soon.
Upgrade Notice.section 5: For any issues, join our Telegram group for support:

translation.have reached the daily limit: {{tokenSymbol}} transfers from {{fromChain}} to {{toChain}} have reached the daily limit, which will reset at 00:00 (UTC) each day. Please try again after the reset.
translation.have a daily limit and your current tran: {{tokenSymbol}} transfers from {{fromChain}} to {{toChain}} have a daily limit and your current transaction exceeds the remaining quota of {{amount}} {{tokenSymbol}}. The limit will reset at 00:00 (UTC) each day. Please try again after the reset or consider transferring a smaller amount.
translation.have a maximum capacity and your current: {{tokenSymbol}} transfers from {{fromChain}} to {{toChain}} have a maximum capacity and your current transaction exceeds the available capacity of {{amount}} {{tokenSymbol}}. The capacity will be refilled in {{time}} minutes. Please try again after that.
translation.Your current transaction exceeds the cap: {{tokenSymbol}} transfers from {{fromChain}} to {{toChain}} have a maximum capacity of {{amount}} {{tokenSymbol}}. Your current transaction exceeds the capacity and can't be processed. Please consider transferring a smaller amount.
translation.eBridge daily limit specification desc: For security purposes, eBridge imposes daily transfer limits for each token in each directions.

eBridge rate limits desc.section 1: Token transfers on eBridge benefit from rate limits for additional security. Rate limits comprise maximum capacity and refill rate, which is the speed at which the maximum capacity is refilled after a token transfer has consumed some or all of the available capacity.
eBridge rate limits desc.section 2: The rate limits are enforced at both the source and destination blockchains to ensure the highest level of security. For each supported token, rate limits effectively manage the total volume of tokens that can be transferred within a specified timeframe.
eBridge rate limits desc.section 3: For example, the maximum capacity of USDT transfer from Ethereum to AELF is 100,000 USDT. The refill rate is 167 USDT per second. If 100,000 USDT is transferred in this direction, the entire capacity is consumed. After that, if a user wants to send 1670 USDT, he/she must wait at least 10 seconds as the capacity refills. This ensures that the maximum throughput for this token in this direction is 100,000 USDT every 10 minutes.

translation.input address error: Please enter a correct address that matches the "To" chain.
translation.Synchronising data on the chain 2: Please wait 5-10 minutes before initiating a new transaction.
translation.Request rejected. eBridge needs your per: Request rejected. eBridge needs your permission to continue.
